xwikidoc.name: Management
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Management
xwikidoc.content:
{{velocity}} = Existing Tests = #set($hql = ", BaseObject as obj where doc.fullName = obj.name and obj.className = 'QA.TestClass' and doc.fullName <> 'QA.TestTemplate'") #set($results = $xwiki.searchDocuments($hql, 0, 0)) #if(!$results.isEmpty()) {{info}}There are currently ${results.size()} Test Cases (QA.TestClass) in the application. For the full list, please visit [[QA WebHome>>QA.WebHome]].{{/info}} #else {{warning}}There are currently no tests. {{/warning}} #end = Existing Apps Versions = #set($hqlapps = ", BaseObject as obj where doc.fullName = obj.name and obj.className = 'QA.AppClass'") #set($results = $xwiki.searchDocuments($hqlapps, 0, 0)) #if(!$results.isEmpty()) #set($collist = ["doc.name", "doc.space", "doc.date", "doc.author", "_actions"]) #set($colprops = { "doc.name" : { "type" : "text" ,"link" : "true", "size" : 30, "sortable":true, "filterable":true}, "_ratings" : { "sortable":false}, "doc.date" : { "type" : "date" }, "doc.author" : { "type" : "text", "link" : "author"}, "_actions" : { 'actions' : ['delete'] } }) #set($options = { "className":"QA.AppClass", "tagCloud" : false, "translationPrefix" : "xe.index.", "rowCount": 10 })
(%class="buttonwrapper"%)[[$services.localization.render('qaapp.Management.AddApp.button')>>QA.AddApp]] #livetable("apps" $collist $colprops $options) #end = Existing Product Versions = #set($hql = ", BaseObject as obj where doc.fullName = obj.name and obj.className = 'QA.ProductClass'") #set($results = $xwiki.searchDocuments($hql, 0, 0)) #if(!$results.isEmpty()) #set($collist = ["doc.name", "doc.space", "doc.date", "doc.author", "_actions"]) #set($colprops = { "doc.name" : { "type" : "text" ,"link" : "true", "size" : 30, "sortable":true, "filterable":true}, "_ratings" : { "sortable":false}, "doc.date" : { "type" : "date" }, "doc.author" : { "type" : "text", "link" : "author"}, "_actions" : { 'actions' : ['delete'] } }) #set($options = { "className":"QA.ProductClass", "tagCloud" : false, "translationPrefix" : "xe.index.", "rowCount": 10 })
(%class="buttonwrapper"%)[[$services.localization.render('qaapp.Management.AddProduct.button')>>QA.AddProduct]] #livetable("products" $collist $colprops $options) #end = Existing Browsers = #set($hql = ", BaseObject as obj where doc.fullName = obj.name and obj.className = 'QA.BrowserClass'") #set($results = $xwiki.searchDocuments($hql, 0, 0)) #if(!$results.isEmpty())
#set($collist = ["doc.name", "doc.space", "doc.date", "doc.author", "_actions"]) #set($colprops = { "doc.name" : { "type" : "text" ,"link" : "true", "size" : 30, "sortable":true, "filterable":true}, "_ratings" : { "sortable":false}, "doc.date" : { "type" : "date" }, "doc.author" : { "type" : "text", "link" : "author"}, "_actions" : { 'actions' : ['delete'] } }) #set($options = { "className":"QA.BrowserClass", "tagCloud" : false, "translationPrefix" : "xe.index.", "rowCount": 10 }) (%class="buttonwrapper"%)[[$services.localization.render('qaapp.Management.AddBrowser.button')>>QA.AddBrowser]] #livetable("browsers" $collist $colprops $options) #end = Existing Databases = #set($hql = ", BaseObject as obj where doc.fullName = obj.name and obj.className = 'QA.DatabaseClass'") #set($results = $xwiki.searchDocuments($hql, 0, 0)) #if(!$results.isEmpty())
#set($collist = ["doc.name", "doc.space", "doc.date", "doc.author", "_actions"]) #set($colprops = { "doc.name" : { "type" : "text" ,"link" : "true", "size" : 30, "sortable":true, "filterable":true}, "_ratings" : { "sortable":false}, "doc.date" : { "type" : "date" }, "doc.author" : { "type" : "text", "link" : "author"}, "_actions" : { 'actions' : ['delete'] } }) #set($options = { "className":"QA.DatabaseClass", "tagCloud" : false, "translationPrefix" : "xe.index.", "rowCount": 10 }) (%class="buttonwrapper"%)[[$services.localization.render('qaapp.Management.AddDatabase.button')>>QA.AddDatabase]] #livetable("databases" $collist $colprops $options) #end = Existing Servlet Containers = #set($hql = ", BaseObject as obj where doc.fullName = obj.name and obj.className = 'QA.ServletContainerClass'") #set($results = $xwiki.searchDocuments($hql, 0, 0)) #if(!$results.isEmpty())
#set($collist = ["doc.name", "doc.space", "doc.date", "doc.author", "_actions"]) #set($colprops = { "doc.name" : { "type" : "text" ,"link" : "true", "size" : 30, "sortable":true, "filterable":true}, "_ratings" : { "sortable":false}, "doc.date" : { "type" : "date" }, "doc.author" : { "type" : "text", "link" : "author"}, "_actions" : { 'actions' : ['delete'] } }) #set($options = { "className":"QA.ServletContainerClass", "tagCloud" : false, "translationPrefix" : "xe.index.", "rowCount": 10 }) (%class="buttonwrapper"%)[[$services.localization.render('qaapp.Management.AddServletContainer.button')>>QA.AddServletContainer]] #livetable("servlets" $collist $colprops $options) #end
= Fix application property = (%class="buttonwrapper"%)[[Set application value to "None">>QA.FixAppValue]]
